script: You will be given three messages from different people Bernadette McComiskey, Mairead Guinness, and Tess Shevlin.
Mairead Guinness: The time we will meet is when the sun starts its travel across the sky.
Tess Shevlin: We will rendezvous where the sea cargo is stored.
Bernadette McComiskey: Bring to the meeting a way to escape quickly over land.
Given the clandestine messages you have received, tell me as specifically as you can, when and where a meeting is going to happen and what you should bring.
